thread.title: TVI in Orange County at Procare Therapy (California)
thread.title_full: TVI in Orange County at Procare Therapy (California)

title: TVI in Orange County at Procare Therapy (California)
text: Source: ProCare Therapy TVI in Orange County, California We are currently seeking a teacher of the visually impaired to work with a district in Orange County, California. This will be a full time opportunity for a permanent position with the district! The caseload will be about 10 students. ProCare Therapy is working with this school district to find a perfect candidate! Job Requirements: ~ Open to recent graduates and those in process of obtaining the TVI certification ~ Open to TVI interns ~ Versed in low vision, braille, and cortical vision Job Duties: ~ Prepare lesson plans and IEPs ~ Adapt instructional materials for visually impaired students ~ Utilize technology to help make students life easier on a day to day basis Please contact Rachel Owh at 678-459-1122 or email Rachel.Owh@ProCareTherapy.com for additional information or to schedule an interview.
